official_title: A resolution to authorize a staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to present himself and be deposed in the matter Bartels v. Field Enterprises, Inc., 75 Civ. 5930 (RLC).

summary.text: Authorizes a staff investigator of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to present himself and be deposed in the matter of Bartels v. Field Enterprises, Inc., 75 Civ. 5930 (RLC).
